=== EastCoastTeam IRC ===

The East Coast Team IRC channel is a place where members of our team can collaborate on projects and meet up with each other. It is also place where East Coasters can go to Find out about Ubuntu and receive support.

Location of Channel: #ubuntu-east on irc.freenode.net:6667 

Ops: <nowiki>[[AlexLauni|iamalex]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[ThomasCuthbert|Whebeft]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[TheeMahn]]</nowiki>
